member.name: T:Atom.Xna.Particles.Particle
member.summary: Represents a single Particle.
member.remarks: The Particle structure is designed in such a way that it can be directly drawn by using the Particle itself as a Vertex.

member.summary: Initializes static members of the Particle structure.

member.summary: Gets the size of the Particle structure in bytes.
